!Kelleyia: Right. Down to business. As you can see, there are Alpine Buffalo, Grendel, Cougar, and Kookaburra all over the place. Cute in their infant state, but vicious if they are raised incorrectly. There are 3 parts to the challenge. Part 1: Raise an Alpine animal to their adult state. Part 2: Slaughter the beast. Part 3...
